summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Watizat app mobile responsiveness, modal functionality, and AI integration. All critical features are working correctly.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay intercepts clicks on bottom navigation when modal is open
ui_bugs.workaround: Close modal before navigating to other tabs

passed_tests: Backend API health check - all endpoints responding correctly
Admin login with provided credentials (admin@watizat.com / admin123)
AI Chat endpoint returns ai_enabled: true (OpenAI integration working)
Mobile responsiveness - Ajudar button does NOT overflow on 320px screen
Modal 'Quero Ajudar' opens correctly on volunteers page
All 4 main categories (Social, Roupa, MÃ³veis, Transporte) displayed in grid
Help requests section appears after category selection
Category filtering and backend integration working
